Personal details

ending in 1234

  • Payment history
  • Journey history

This view shows the travel charges that we have made to your contactless payment card. We sometimes delay collecting payment as we wait for our system to update. To see all your journeys, including those we have not yet charged you for, select the "Journey history" view above.

Any journeys made between 01:30 to 04:30 will not be displayed in your payment history until tomorrow.
